__prompts__.CONFIG_PATH: Enter the location of your configs directory (/schemas, input.json, output.json, transform.json, secrets.json)
__prompts__.DOCKER_IMAGE: Enter the Docker Image (repo name with tag, e.g. 'test-repo:latest') to be used for the AWS Lambda Function (enter 'local' if you wish to build & push a minimal example)
__prompts__.APP_CONFIG_NAME: Enter a name for the AWS AppConfig
__prompts__.APP_CONFIG_ENV_NAME: Enter a name for the AWS AppConfig Environment
__prompts__.FUNCTION_NAME: Enter a name for the AWS Lambda Function
__prompts__.FUNCTION_DESCRIPTION: Enter a description for the AWS Lambda Function
__prompts__.FUNCTION_MEMORY_SIZE: Specify the memory size for the AWS Lambda Function (in MB)
__prompts__.FUNCTION_TIMEOUT: Specify the timeout for the AWS Lambda Function (in seconds)
